description: Isle of Man businesses "need workers to be upskilled and reskilled", the Chamber of Commerce says.
title: Coronavirus: 'Urgent need' to retrain Isle of Man workers
title_page: Coronavirus: 'Urgent need' to retrain Isle of Man workers - BBC News
maintext: Changes to the workforce are "somewhat inevitable for some businesses" in the new climate, she said, and some employees will "need to have other opportunities and options for earning income".
